title: The Existential Fears of Buddhists in Sri Lanka must be given high priority and addressed without delay
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – A specter is haunting Sri Lanka. The specter of the country being overrun by Muslims. That something so unpleasant might happen in Sri Lanka virtually unopposed and unresisted by those who have been elected to power exclusively by the urban and rural Buddhist vote explains to a great…
